original_text: A very large crowd of people were following Jesus. There were many women among them. They were crying with loud voices. They were weeping and crying because they were very sad.
korean_text: 또 백성과 및 그를 위하여 가슴을 치며 슬피 우는 여자의 큰 무리가 따라오는지라

sentences.original_text: A very large crowd of people were following Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 아주 많은 무리가 예수님을 따르고 있었다
